example: The Westerlies blow from the sea and bring warm air to Europe.
The North Atlantic Current is a warm current.
Norway has many deep bays called fjords.
European farmers grow grain in the large plains.
Europe has many languages but many of them are similar.
The countries of Europe worked together for unification.
The EU is a group that is economically and politically unified.
19 countries use the same money, the Euro.
The Alps is a famous mountain range in Europe.
The southern part of Europe has high altitude mountains.
